I find the crypto nomenclature confusing. You know how the “$” sign makes it easy to use equity tickers? Everybody knows $AAPL designates Apple Inc. stock. We need the same for crypto. Let me introduce you to the new standart:  💩BTC = Bitcoin. 💩ETH = Ethereum. 💩LTC = Litecoin.
